citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 P.M. on
31-May-17.
Called the licensee and she stated that she was at the veterinarian and not available for inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Boone Bonnie, Veterinary Medical Officer
